directions: In a large pot, heat oil over medium heat.  Cook turmeric, ginger and chile paste in oil until fragrant, 1 to 2 minutes.  Stir in chicken, broth, sugar, soy sauce and celery.  Bring to a boil, then introduce noodles and cook 3 minutes.  Stir in lettuce and remove from heat.  Serve garnished with green onions.
title: Chinese Chicken Soup
